name: Mushymania II
description:
A thousand years before the events of Mushymania, Mýkion, child of Mushy, born of a non-chronological Mushling spore, sets off on their own grand adventure! First, they must seek out the approval of the three goddesses and undergo their trials. Only then may they take on Atropos' plan for mass distortion. Oh, and it is rumored that seven hidden keys seal away a great evil...

All sales will go to The Trevor Project. Mushymania II was developed to raise money during Winter Pride 2021, running December 3rd to 5th, 2021.

Purchases of $15 or more will be able to download a selection of concept art and miscellaneous mushroomy murals (not really murals).

Credits
Programmer, Game Designer: Kaylee Maya (Twitter: @WitchsHex)
Art Lead, Concept Art: Skadi Kaos (Twitter: @skadi_c | Art Twitter: @skadi_art )
Music, Sound Design: Jamie Paige (Twitter: @polyromantic | Bandcamp: jamiepaige.bandcamp.com) 
Trailer: Alexis Eva (Twitter: @involutegirl)
